items.name: Breakfast in Luxembourg
items.desc: The latest in our range of seasonal brews, this Espresso Stout is a collaboration with Bare Brewing from Luxembourg, inspired by their own fantastic Espresso Stout we drank whilst at the Metz Beer Fest in October 2019. Coffee obtained locally from Rising Ground in Wadebridge. This beer is suitable for vegans. Contains barley, wheat and caffeine.

items.name: Connor’s Stout
items.desc: Connor's Stout is our Brew 500, so it had to be something special. Imperial Smoked Stout - 11% Each can features artwork by the Connor Brothers. Funds raised for CALM. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Craft Beer Selection
items.summary: 6 x 440ml cans of our latest and best craft beers
items.desc: This selection is the perfect gift for the craft beer lover in your life (or for yourself!) and features a mixture of some of our favourite beers from both our core and seasonal ranges. *Exact contents may vary from those shown depending on stock availability, but we will make sure you get a great selection of beers!

items.name: Design by Committee
items.desc: Our Top Secret Collaboration with @craftcangang Double dry-hopped DIPA with a big hit Nelson Sauvin, backed up with Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe and Amarillo Contains Barley, Wheat and Oats. Unfiltered and unfined - suitable for vegans.

items.name: Gluten Free Selection
items.summary: 6 fantastic Padstow Brewing beers, all gluten free
items.desc: We have been working hard to make some of our most popular beers gluten free and are pleased to present our gluten free selection box just in time for Christmas. Featuring a selection from our bottled and canned beers, from lagers, pale ales and bitters, this box contains a minimum of three different beers to enjoy. *All our beers are treated with an enzyme which removes the gluten to <20ppm but the beers are made from barley and wheat.

items.name: Go Man Go
items.desc: Mango Sorbet DIPA. An unexpected re-release of one of the most popular beers we have ever produced. Mango and Passionfruit go hand in hand with English and American Hop Varieties Stunning artwork by local artist Phoebe Roberts. Contains barley, wheat and oats. Unfined and unfiltered. Suitable for vegans.

items.name: Hop, Skip and Dance
items.desc: Brand new! Our collaboration brew with Bulletproof Brewing from Plymouth is a beautifully clean lager, with a wonderful aroma from Nelson Sauvin and Wakatu hops and warm bready notes from the decoction mash. Artwork by Anna Harris from Falmouth University Contains Barley and Wheat. Unfiltered and unfined - suitable for vegans.

items.name: Lobster Tale
items.desc: Lobster Tale is our wheat beer. It contains coriander and orange peel which combine to give a wonderfully zesty finish. This mini keg contains 5 litres (8.8 pints). Directions for use are printed on the container. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat,which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Mixed Beer Case
items.desc: Get a 12 beer mystery mixed case of Padstow Brewing Co. beers, handpicked by the brewery (beer only). Usually a minimum of 5 different types, usually more. Please specify if you would like particular beers included, or excluded. These beers are all suitable for vegetarians. Please specify if you want beers all suitable for vegans. They contain barley and wheat,which are sources of gluten. Please note: Mixed cases are sent in our usual, robust, courier safe packaging. The image is for graphic purposes only.

items.name: Padstow IPA
items.desc: An English IPA with a traditionally strong ABV. Careful hopping means it’s refreshing, satisfying and rather moreish. Goes well with: Strong, spicy food (great with curry); bold, sweet desserts like carrot cake; mild cheeses such as mild cheddar or mild blue. This is our best selling bottled beer and has won CAMRA Gold and Taste of the West Gold. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free. ** Also available in 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Padstow Local
items.desc: Padstow Local - our popular and refined 4% Best Bitter, available for the first time in 568ml bottle. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Padstow May Day
items.desc: May Day is the most important day of the year for us in Padstow, and we originally created this beer specifically to celebrate it. Due to it's overwhelming popularity, we eventually made it a core beer so we could continue to brew it year-round. Made with extra pale malt and 100% citra hops it has a tropical and slightly bitter flavour with a citrus and elderflower aroma. A crisp, smooth and refreshing pint. Goes well with: Spicy Spanish and Italian meats, spicy paella, pizza and pasta dishes. This beer has been awarded SIBA Gold and Taste of the West Silver. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free. ** Also available in 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Padstow Pale Ale
items.desc: Noticeably hopped with a good balanced bitterness and a refreshing aroma. Still manages to pack a punch for a low ABV beer by the mix of English and American hops added at the steeping stage. Goes well with: meat pies and mild cheddar. Also great with a beef or chicken burger. Our Pale Ale has won Taste of the West Silver and SIBA Bronze. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten. ** Also available in 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Padstow Pilot
items.desc: ** Available in mini-keg ** For Padstow Pilot, our traditional Cornish Porter, we have combined pale, chocolate and black malt with English hops for a wonderfully rich colour and complex flavour. SIBA Gold award winning beer. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Padstow Pilsner
items.desc: Padstow Pilsner is made in the traditional way using only the best lager malt and Saaz hops. The beer is carefully fermented at low temperatures to deliver a clean, crisp and refreshing drink. Our pilsner won Best Beer at the Great British Food Awards 2018 and Taste of the West Gold. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free. Please note that this Pilsner is unfiltered for the best possible taste, but may contain a slight haze when poured. ** Also available in a 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Padstow Pride
items.desc: Back by popular demand! Padstow Pride has an abundance of malty flavour and a smooth finish thanks to a touch of Cornish honey. All the taste of a traditional bitter, only better. Goes well with: Chocolate, malty breads, and caramel. Perfect with a rich and indulgent dessert. This beer has won Taste of the West Silver. This beer is suitable for vegetarians. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Padstow Sunshine Cider
items.desc: This unique Normandy-style Cornish cider was developed by wine and cider maker John Coulson of Polgoon Vineyard in collaboration with Caron Archer (Head Brewer at Padstow Brewing Co.). Our Sunshine Cider contains pressed English Dessert and Bramley Apples and is fermented using the finest Champagne yeast. The result is a crisp, mouth-watering cider that leaves a satisfyingly long finish. Goes well with: Pork belly and scallops. Perfect with a gammon joint and some crackling. This cider is suitable for vegans and is gluten free. ** A 5% version of this cider is available in 5 litre mini-keg ** ** The appearance may be different from the image as currently this cider is being packaged in amber bottles.**

items.name: Padstow Windjammer
items.desc: Padstow Windjammer was originally brewed as a one off seasonal autumn brew with specialised malt to achieve its distinctive copper colour. It has since become our most popular draught ale. A malt-driven traditional English ale with a smooth nutty finish and a subtle spiced fruit aroma. Goes well with: roast chicken or pork, fish & chips, and mild cheese. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, but has had the gluten removed to <20ppm, and so is now labelled as Gluten Free. ** Also available in 5 litre mini-keg **

items.name: Pocket Rocket
items.desc: It's back! Pocket Rocket is an American style Pale Ale, brewed with vibrant U.S hop varieties and dry hopped to add even more flavour and aroma. Unfiltered, unpasteurised and unfined for maximum freshness! This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat.

items.name: Real Ale Selection
items.summary: 6 pint bottles of Padstow Real Ale
items.desc: Designed for the ale lover in your life, this real ale selection makes a perfect gift, and comes complete with a resuable heavyweight branded Padstow Brewing Jute Bag. Containing a minimum of 3 different beers from our bottled beer selection this is equally suited to someone who is not familiar with our award winning beers, or a more established fan. *All beers are labelled as Gluten Free, having had the gluten removed to <20ppm.

items.name: Shallow End
items.desc: Available for the first time ever in minikeg! Our small beer, Shallow End, is hugely popular in can, and at 2.8% makes the perfect minikeg beer. Despite the low ABV, Shallow End is packed with hoppy character and a wonderful piney, resinous finish. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley, wheat and oats, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: Sunlight Cider
items.desc: Available for the first time ever in minikeg, our 5% Sunlight Cider is perfect for those warm days in the garden, on the balcony or even in the kitchen! Based on our hugely popular Sunshine Cider, this is a more sessionable 5% whilst retaining the same great flavour. This product is Gluten Free and suitable for both vegetarians and vegans.

items.name: Sunshine Cider Gift Set
items.desc: Love our Sunshine Cider? Following popular demand we have added this to our Christmas Gift selection - 6 pint bottles of our hugely popular Sunshine Cider, in a high quality branded and reusable bag.

items.name: Support the Lobster Hatchery
items.desc: *New in 440ml can for 2020!* This wheat beer was developed for the National Lobster Hatchery, an amazing charity based in Padstow. 10p from each can will be donated to help conserve vulnerable lobster populations. This contributes to safeguarding the future of our seafood industry and the many livelihoods and coastal communities it supports. Lobster tale is naturally cloudy and an extremely light and refreshing style of wheat beer. Goes well with: Salmon, Oysters, Scallops, Mussels, Clams, Crab, and of course.. Lobster! This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten. No lobsters were harmed in the making of this beer.

items.name: The 12 Beers of Christmas
items.summary: Christmas has 12 days, and you are going to need 12 beers to enjoy them all!
items.desc: There is no better way to celebrate Christmas than with Padstow Brewing Co's 12 Beers of Christmas! A mixture of bottled ale and canned craft beer, hand picked by the brewery team and concealed behind our unique "12 days" cover, so you won't know what fantastic beer each day will bring you! They're shipped in our mail-order boxes with a perforated numbered cover - just a bit of fun! It's designed to be opened over 12 days - but we won't be upset if all of the numbers are opened at once! This makes a perfect gift for the beer lover in your life and for £50, the price includes shipping! (The contents are already discounted and so this product is not eligible for additional discount). These beers may contain barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.

items.name: The Padstow Extra!
items.summary: 6 beers, all 8% or higher - make it an Extra Special Christmas!
items.desc: Enjoy Christmas 2020 in extra-special style with the Padstow-Extra box. 6 x 440ml cans of some of our finest, and strongest beers including. 2 cans of our Go Man Go 8% mango Ssrbet DIPA 2 cans of Design by Committee, our 8% DIPA brewed in collaboration with @craftcangang and filled with hoppy-dankness 2 cans of Connor's Stout, our 11% smoked Imperial stout. These beers contain barley, wheat and oats which are sources of gluten.

items.name: The Smoke
items.desc: Made with seven different malts, including beech-smoked malt and rolled oats, this stout is rich, smooth and malty with a subtle smokey aftertaste. Winner of the SIBA British Dark Beers 2019 National Gold award. This beer is suitable for vegans. It contains barley and wheat, which are sources of gluten.
